title: Doping Dependence of the in-Plane Transition in Co$_3$Sn$_2$S$_2$
abstract: In Co$_3$Sn$_2$S$_2$ two transitions are observed, the main one to a ferromagnetic state at $T_C = 174$ K and the second one, involving in-plane components at $T_P = 127$ K. We follow their doping dependence as Sn is replaced with In, which causes a reduction of $T_C$ and $T_P$. Importantly, both transitions follow the same doping dependence, indicating a single energy scale involved with both processes.
comment: accepted as a short note in JPSJ; a continuation of work published in arXiv:2211.01483 and https://doi.org/10.1103/PhysRevB.106.L180403
